inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Shortbow', 'CriticalChance', 5); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Longbow', 'CriticalChance', 5); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Expert Training, Bows
description: You gain an additional +5 chance to inflict critical hits with shortbows and longbows.
